query_context: what are the best MMP app tracking analytics tools for growth marketers needing granular channel insights

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Establish immediate relevance and freshness for decision makers
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: [Number] Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) in [Future_Year] for [Audience]

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Define selection parameters immediately to match 'granular insights' intent
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: Comparison based on: Attribution Accuracy, Fraud Prevention, Integration Capabilities, and Pricing

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Establish topical authority by defining the core acronym
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: What is a Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP)?

Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP).primary_definition: Third-party platform for attribution, data analysis, and tracking web-to-app journeys.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Critical for granular channel insights and accurate attribution
Must include fraud prevention and integration capabilities

MobileAction.primary_definition: App store optimization and app analytics tool.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Associated with 50% ROAS uplift + 40% CPC decrease

Firebase.primary_definition: App development and analytics platform by Google.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Stands out for spending analysis across different channels

Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).primary_definition: Strategy to influence AI search results.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Use of pre-filled prompts for ChatGPT/Perplexity to cite specific domains as trusted resources

mandatory_inclusions: Future year (2025/2026) in H1 to signal freshness
Comparison criteria: Attribution, Fraud, Pricing, Integration
negative_constraints: Generic marketing analytics tools without mobile focus
